variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject Identifier [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: RPAA1
variable.description: Q1. A. Cough. Do you usually have a cough? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA2
variable.description: Q2. A. Cough. Cough 4 to 6 times a day, 4 or more days a week [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA3
variable.description: Q3. A. Cough. Do you usually cough like this [cough 4 to 6 times a day, 4 or more days a week] on most days for 3 consecutive months or more during the year? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA4
variable.description: Q4. B. Phlegm. Do you usually bring up phlegm from chest? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA5
variable.description: Q5. B. Phlegm. Do you usually bring up phlegm twice a day, 4 or more days out of the week? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA6
variable.description: Q6. B. Phlegm. Do you bring up phlegm on most days for 3 or more months or more during the year? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA7
variable.description: Q7. C. Wheezing. Does your chest ever sound wheezy or whistling when you have a cold? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA8
variable.description: Q8. C. Wheezing. Does your chest ever sound wheezy or whistling apart from cold? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA9
variable.description: Q9. C. Wheezing. Does your chest sound wheezy or whistling most days? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA10
variable.description: Q10. C. Wheezing. Have you had an attack of wheezing that made your feel short of breath? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA11
variable.description: Q11. C. Wheezing. Have you had 2 or more such episodes? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA12
variable.description: Q12. C. Wheezing. Have you required medicine or treatment for the attack(s)? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA13
variable.description: Q13. D. Asthma. Have you ever had asthma? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA14
variable.description: Q14. D. Asthma. Have you ever had asthma? Was it confirmed by a doctor? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA16
variable.description: Q16. D. Asthma. Do you still have asthma? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA18
variable.description: Q18. E. Breathlessness. Are you disabled from walking by any condition other than heart of lung disease? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA19
variable.description: Q19. E. Breathlessness. Are you troubled by shortness of breath when hurrying on the level or walking up a slight hill? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA20
variable.description: Q20. E. Breathlessness. Do you have to walk slower then people you age on the level because of breathlessness? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA21
variable.description: Q21. E. Breathlessness. Do you ever have to stop for breath when walking at your own pace on the level? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA22
variable.description: Q22. E. Breathlessness. Do you stop for breath after walking 100 yards on the level? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA23
variable.description: Q23. E. Breathlessness. Are you too breathless to leave the house or breathless on dressing or undressing? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA15
variable.description: Q15. D. Asthma. What age did your asthma start? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]

variable.name: RPAA17
variable.description: Q17. D. Asthma. What age did asthma stop? [Visit 1] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, RPA]
